attributes.action: instruct the Foreign Office to report regularly on the health and prospects of Archbishop Kutino, who is in prison in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (having returned voluntarily from asylum in France); and to ensure that so long as he remains in prision, no asylum seekers in the UK, having an association with him, are returned to the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amnesty International has conern with this case
